outline:
Mizpah = "watchtower"
  1. a place in Gilead north of Jabbok and location of Laban's cairn
  2. a place in Gilead south of Jabbok; site unknown
  3. a place near Mount Hermon
  4. an old sacred place in Benjamin
kjv_def: Mitspah. (This seems rather to be only an orthographic variation of H4708 (מִצְפֶּה) when 'in pause'.)
strongs_def: Mitspah, the name of two places in Palestine
